meanings.sent1: The tubulin helps in building the tiny tubes inside cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study tubulin to understand how cells maintain their structure.
meanings.sent3: When the tubulin threw a party, all the microtubules showed up!
meanings.sent4: The tubulin acted like a construction worker, assembling the cellular highways.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, tubulin looks like a busy worker bee creating pathways.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of proteins that are part of microtubules.
meanings.sent1: Microtubules rely on tubulin to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist identified the specific tubulin responsible for cell division.
meanings.sent3: The tubulin family reunion was a big success, with all the proteins mingling happily.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, tubulin is like the building blocks holding everything together.
meanings.sent5: The dance of tubulin proteins creates the intricate structure of microtubules.
